data.event: FREMONT — Violet Stubblefield had a look of surprise when she opened the door Wednesday morning.

event.title: a typical day, the 96-year-old Fremont woman receives

data.event: On a typical day, the 96-year-old Fremont woman receives a lunch delivery from Linda Wasserman, a 16-year volunteer with Fremont-based LIFE ElderCare Meals on Wheels.
But on this day, Wasserman brought along a special guest — her husband, Bob, the city's mayor.
